A

acceptBattleRequest(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, Request) - Method in class root.GameServer
acceptBattleRequest confirms the request sent from one user to another asking for battle and deletes it from the notification lists for both users.
acceptFriendRequest(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, Request) - Method in class root.GameServer
acceptFriendRequest First, the notification is deleted, then the id of both users are exchanged and put into their lists of 'friends', it the method fails, the exception is redirected to be handled by printStackTrace method
acceptRequest(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class root.GameServer
acceptRequest marks the request as 'accepted'.
addFriend(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class root.GameServer
addFriend a method tries to find the matching string in database and if it is found, the match is sent a friend request if the friend is not found, an error message is returned when friend request is accepted/declined by the user, the method either creates the link between players or not.
addFriend(User) - Method in class root.User
 
addMonster(Monster) - Method in class root.User
 
addUser(User) - Method in class root.UserManager
 
ageHealth() - Method in class root.Monster
Modifies the monster's health and strength based on its age.
aggression - Variable in class root.Monster
 
atkSuccess(Monster) - Method in class root.Battle
A defending monster has a defence chance of evading an attack.
attack(Monster, Monster) - Method in class root.Battle
One monster attacks the other, checks if they reached 0 health.
